article_title: What Everyone Should Know About Rationing By Waiting

article_metadata.description: Americans like to think that our health care system is very different from “socialized medicine” in Canada. In fact, the two health care systems are far more similar than they are different. In Canada, when people go to the doctor the visit is free. In America, it’s almost free. On the [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
